actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution calling on the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to reduce the current high interest rates in order to relieve the economic distress of those in the automotive and housing industries and others.

summary.text: Declares that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should reduce and stabilize interest rates to relieve economic distress.

titles.title: A resolution calling on the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to reduce the current high interest rates in order to relieve the economic distress of those in the automotive and housing industries and others.
